amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for defense health programs by $10 million offset by a reduction in funds for the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation Defense Program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase TBI funds by $10,000,000 for a pilot project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Sessions.
